marklogic.body: If your real question is -- Do I want to know want most idiots like you think? Â Then, the answer is -- I don't give a fvck. Â People like you have nothing to hang onto but excuses. Â To your own entertainment, you try to baffle some the folks here with your BS, but that's all it is. Â Understand that it takes some effort to be a "black conservative". Â Most of us were once Democrats by default (just like you), surrounded by the same ideology that has kept many black people poor and ignorant for decades. Â We challenged the status quo BS, because it simply didn't add up, and we began to read, speak, and think for ourselves. Â We realize that short of catching the entire CBC & POTUS in the Act of looting your bank account, Burning down your house, and beating down your mother, you probably will never find any fault them --- hence the reason that I don't give a fvck about what people like you think of people like me.
